data.name: Sterling Silver with White Velvet Interior - Metal Casket
data.description:
FEATURES:

  • STEEL CONSTRUCTION - Premium 18-gauge steel with continuous weld bottom panel 
  • EXTERIOR FINISH - Automotive quality brushed silver finish
  • INTERIOR LINING - White velvet gracefully gathered with deep tufting featured in the head panel
  • HARDWARE - Rounded corners, silver colored swing handlebar hardware
  • FULLY SEALED AND LOCKED -  full rubber gasket sealer and locking mechanism
  • HALF COUCH & ADJUSTABLE BED - Bed adjusts at head and foot for worry-free viewings
  • FULLY APPOINTED - Coordinating plush pillow and throw and memory tube for cherished keepsakes
  • QUALITY ASSURANCE - All caskets pass a 10-point quality control inspection before leaving the factory

DIMENSIONS:

  • Fits Standard Burial Vaults
  • INTERIOR - 79 Length x 23.5 Width
  • EXTERIOR - 81 Length x 28.5 Width x 23.5 Height
  • WEIGHT - 200 Pounds
data.page_title: Sterling Silver Metal Caskets for Sale with White Velvet Interior | Overnight Caskets
data.meta_description: Sterling Silver casket with white velvet. 60% off funeral home prices. Free shipping. Satisfaction guaranteed.

  • HALF COUCH & ADJUSTABLE BED - Bed adjusts at head and foot for worry-free viewings
  • FULLY APPOINTED - Coordinating plush pillow and throw and memory tube for cherished keepsakes
  • QUALITY ASSURANCE - All caskets pass a 10-point quality control inspection before leaving the factory

DIMENSIONS:

  • Fits Standard Burial Vaults
  • INTERIOR - 79 Length x 23.5 Width
  • EXTERIOR - 81 Length x 28.5 Width x 23.5 Height
  • WEIGHT - 200 Pounds
